paper_abstract: This article presents the didactic content and educational software that involves every phase of modal testing teaching This tool provides a useful help Theoretical examples can be generated at the first stages of the learning process Real test data can be acquired and analyzed Initial examples are used in model comparisons (c) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc Comput Appl Eng Educ 18 485-494, 2010, View this article online at wileyonlinelibrary com, DOI 10 1002/cae 20205
paper_title: Educational Software Program for Teaching Modal Testing
